// src/StorePage.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import "./Style/StorePage.css"; const StorePage = ({ cartItems = [], setCartItems }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // State lấy data từ backend const [games, setGames] = useState([]); const [justAdded, setJustAdded] = useState(false); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); // Fetch tất cả games khi component mount useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/games") .then(res => setGames(res.data)) .catch(err => console.error("Fetch games error:", err)); }, []); // Lọc theo searchTerm const filteredGames = games.filter(game => game.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleGameClick = key => { navigate(`/game/${key}`); }; const handleAddToCart = game => { setCartItems([ ...cartItems, game ]); setJustAdded(true); setTimeout(() => setJustAdded(false), 1500); }; return (
{/* Header */}
MySteam
navigate("/")}>Home navigate("/special")}>Special offers
Cart: {cartItems.length}
{/* Banner */}
{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Search Results */} {searchTerm && (
{filteredGames.length > 0 ? ( filteredGames.map(game => (
handleGameClick(game.key)} >

{game.title}

${game.price}
)) ) : (

); }; export default StorePage;
